Azure Active Directory B2C

Consumer identity and access management for the cloud

1RMB Trial Buy Now

Azure Active Directory B2C is a cloud-based identity and access management solution for your consumer-facing web and mobile applications. It is a highly-available global service that scales to hundreds of millions of consumer identities. Built on an enterprise-grade secure platform, Azure Active Directory B2C keeps your business and your consumers protected.

Pricing details

Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2C usage will be billed monthly based on the number of authentications. An authentication is a token issued either in response to a sign-in request initiated by a user, or initiated by an application on behalf of a user (e.g. token refresh, where the refresh interval is configurable).

Usage will be billed using a volume-based tiered model, as shown below.

AUTHENTICATIONS/MONTH GENERAL AVAILABILITY PRICE
First 50,000 Free
Next 950,000 ¥0.0285
Next 9,000,000 ¥0.0214
Next 40,000,000 ¥0.0142
Greater than 50,000,000 ¥0.00712

Azure Multi-Factor Authentication for Azure AD B2C users will be charged at a flat fee of ¥0.305 per authentication.

For all other customers, Azure AD B2C usage will be billed at a low flat rate for each authentication, with no free tier. Azure Multi-Factor Authentication for B2C users will also be charged at a flat rate. For pricing, please contact your partner or 21Vianet.

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support to select self-service or any other method to contact us for support.
